text:
*[Bug 18710] Partial matching issues in the R sources*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18710>

Michael Chirico (<mailto:michaelchirico4@gmail.com|michaelchirico4@gmail.com>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
             Status|UNCONFIRMED                 |CLOSED
         Resolution|---                         |FIXED

--- Comment #3 from Michael Chirico (<mailto:michaelchirico4@gmail.com|michaelchirico4@gmail.com>) ---
Thanks Sebastian! Indeed I tried to avoid changing partial matching in tests
designed to _explicitly_ cover such behavior.

IMO, relying on implicit testing of behavior is not ideal, but you're right
that simply amending the tests is maybe not the best approach -- better would
be to duplicate such tests and explicitly call out that partial matching is
being tested. Anyway, that can be a project for another time.

Agree this can be closed; done.
